subject: Officiating (Sports)
Football
College Athletics
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Sarah Thomas, big-time college football’s only female referee, has grown accustomed to startling players and coaches, but says it does not occur as often as one might think.
snippet: Sarah Thomas, big-time college football’s only female referee, has grown accustomed to startling players and coaches, but says it does not occur as often as one might think.
